metadata.title: CVE-2019-13458 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Open Ticket Request System (OTRS) 7.0.x through7.0.8, and Community Edition 5.0.x through 5.0.36 and 6.0.x through 6.0.19.An attacker who is logged into OTRS as an agent user with appropriatepermissions can leverage OTRS notification tags in templates in order todisclose hashed user passwords.

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
